name: RollAmissile - GMTK 2022
description:
A Dice-Themed Game About Shooting Missiles And Destroying The enemy A fun little game Made in nearly 8 hours For the GMTK 2022 Jam Also this is the first Jam that I've contributed in <3

How to play -

  • Press "E" To roll A dice and launch Missiles
  • press 'Escape' To open the Pause Menu
